name: Cauliflower Shrimp Salad
author: Amy Brolsma
summary: Thinly sliced, raw cauliflower and cooked shrimp, marinated in a creamy dressing, are the main ingredients in this unusual salad. This has always been a hit at potlucks and family get-togethers.  It tastes best if you make it a day before you plan to serve it.
ingredients: 1 pound shrimp - cooked, peeled, deveined and chilled
¾ cup creamy Italian-style salad dressing
directions: Place eggs in a small saucepan, and add water to cover
Cover the pan, and bring to a boil over high heat
Remove from heat and let stand covered for 12 minutes
Cool, peel, and chop the hard boiled eggs
Mix mayonnaise and salad dressing  together in a small bowl
To a large bowl, add cauliflower, shrimp, green onions, chopped eggs, olives, and pimientos
Stir in dressing mixture, and toss to coat
